name: Tax Officer
text: My liege, analysis shows that tax increases on the population shall benefit our economy. We will increase taxes as soon as you give permission.

options.text: Very well then. The bread of the poor shall fill my vaults. (+2% tax rate)
options.reaction: Yes, my liege; your word is my command. Their bread shall be ours.

options.text: Fire the analysts. Clearly, their work ducks. Taxes shall not be raised.
options.reaction: Yes, my liege. We cannot risk ruffling the feathers of our fellow ducks.

name: Angry Citizen
text: We, the working duck, are living hand to beak. Taxes are making it increasingly difficult to survive in this galaxy. We have families, Lord {user}..

options.text: You have convinced me, I shall take the burden off your wings. (-5% tax rate)
options.reaction: Thank you, my lord. You have restored my hope for the future. May the whole empire quack your praises.

options.text: Such insolence! There is no spot for broke motherduckers like you within my empire.
options.reaction: You are a terrible ducking duck-king!

name: Shady Merchant
text: Oh great warlord, I offer thee artifacts from worlds thousands of galaxies away. They might bring happiness to your subjects.

options.text: I shall buy your artifacts.. (-30 coins)
options.reaction: A pleasure doing business, overlord. I had to duck and dive to find this one.

options.text: This smells fishy.
options.reaction: Tch. How unfortunate. To think you would let such a wondrous opportunity fly away.

name: Fate Mage
text: Overlord... care to take a gamble with the currents of fate?

options.text: Sure, after all, I’m a pretty lucky duck.
options.reaction: Excellent!

options.text: I must reject your offer. I’ll just pray that I have a stroke of good duck instead.
options.reaction: Such ignorance will cause irreparable quacks in your empire. Collapse is imminent.

name: Bounty Huntress
text: Overlord, a criminal wreaks havoc on your subjects. The civilians are quacking in fear. Pay me, and I will hunt them down.

options.text: Very well then. I shall pray that you catch them in your talons. (-40 coins)
options.reaction: Your quarry is mine, my lord. I will bring you news one way or another.

options.text: Shut up, you quacker
options.reaction: Then your people will bleed in the streets, and it will be on your conscience. Not mine.

name: Witch
text: For a small offering, I will peer into the mood of your subjects.

options.text: I shall pay you, but if I notice any signs of trickery, you’ll be tar and feathered. (-30 coins)
options.reaction: I will reveal some quacking knowledge, pay close attention.

options.text: Kiss my buttquack.
options.reaction: You bloody quackhead! My fellow witches shall not tolerate such rudeness, especially from an old geese-r like you!

name: Refugee Fleet
text: Oh great Lord {user}, he who is the conqueror of vast space, we beg you to grant us sanctuary.

options.text: I shall take you under my wing. (-30 coins)
options.reaction: We thank you. The little ducklings shall now quack your name with joy for all their lives.

options.text: Go away! You can duck and cover wherever else you wish.
options.reaction: Please... no. Our children. You heartless duck! You will regret this.

name: God
text: Mortal, I demand a sacrifice to prove your devotion.

options.text: Offer a sacrifice (-30 coins)
options.reaction: Your devotion is noted, mortal. May your reign be long and prosperous.

options.text: Never!
options.reaction: You have made a mistake.. this will cost you dearly.

name: Scientist
text: Lord {user}, I am close to a scientific breakthrough. But I just need more funding to complete my research.

options.text: Very well, I will give you the funding you desire. (-30 coins)
options.reaction: Thank you, my liege! Your support shall not be forgotten.

options.text: I cannot allocate funds for frivolous research at this time.
options.reaction: I see... I shall find another way to continue my work.

name: Jester
text: Great lord {user}! If you give me a bit of coin, I will entertain you and your subjects for the rest of your reign!

options.text: Why not? (-50 coins)
options.reaction: Thank you! I will return daily!

options.text: No thanks.
options.reaction: Alright... maybe another time.

name: Protestor
text: Lord {user}, we demand better living conditions and lower taxes! Hear our quacks!

options.text: Very well, I shall lower taxes and improve living conditions. (-5% tax rate)
options.reaction: Thank you, Lord {user}. You are truly an eggstrordinary leader.

options.text: Silence! Anyone caught protesting will be punished severely.
options.reaction: You will regret this, tyrant! The people will rise against you!

name: Intern
text: Overlord! If you hire me, I promise to work hard and make your empire money!

options.text: Alright, you seem eager enough. You're hired! (-75 coins)
options.reaction: Thank you, my lord! I won't let you down!

options.text: No thanks, we don't need more help right now.
options.reaction: Oh... alright. Maybe another time.

name: Politician
text: Great Lord {user}, I have ideas to monetize your country! The people may not like it, but it will certainly make you money!

options.text: Very well, implement your ideas.
options.reaction: Thank you, my lord! Your coffers shall overflow!

options.text: No thanks, I prefer to keep my people happy.
options.reaction: I see... perhaps another time then.

name: Donald Duck
text: Listen folks, the refugees, they're coming in, and let me tell you, they're stealing our land. They don’t contribute anything, to us folks! They're eating the ducks, they're eating the chicks! They take our money, they take our property. It’s unbelievable! But I've got a solution, a tremendous solution. For the right price, I can get rid of them. We will make this empire great again, believe me!

options.text: Alright Donald, you got this. (-75 coins)
options.reaction: Thank you, lord! You won't regret this, believe me!

options.text: No thanks, I prefer to keep my empire inclusive.
options.reaction: Sad! You’re making a big mistake, believe me!
